title: How to Gift a Greeting Card in an Impressive Manner

steps.headline: Take a thick chart paper & draw a cartoon-style sketch of a large, beautiful kangaroo.
Make and cut its pouch from another piece of paper and paste it on to the kangaroo's stomach - just like a real kangaroo's stomach pouch.
steps.description: Glue around the edges and leave the pouch open in the middle and on the top for opening.

steps.headline: Put your greeting card into the pouch and gift it to your friend or relative.

text: Take a thick chart paper & draw a cartoon-style sketch of a large, beautiful kangaroo. Paint or colour it. Make and cut its pouch from another piece of paper and paste it on to the kangaroo's stomach - just like a real kangaroo's stomach pouch. Glue around the edges and leave the pouch open in the middle and on the top for opening. Put your greeting card into the pouch and gift it to your friend or relative.
